title: Ultimate All-Inclusive Private Island Resort with Unlimited Food & Alcoholic Beverages
description: Experience world-renowned barefoot luxury at Asia's ultimate all-inclusive private island paradise where you can enjoy unlimited food and alcoholic beverages 24 hours a day. Unwind and indulge at the ultra-exclusive island hideaway of Song Saa resort in Cambodia. Includes daily breakfast, lunch, snacks and dinner plus unlimited alcoholic house beverages and non-alcoholic beverages, complimentary daily minibar, unlimited in-villa dining, return car and speedboat transfers, complimentary snorkelling, kayaking and sailing, a long tail boat tour, mini-massages and more.
offer_address: Koh Ouen Private Island, Koh Rong Archipelago, Near Sihanoukville, Cambodia
